name: Hypnotic Songs
description: Mesmerizing chants weaken cultural defenses and bend minds.

name: Psychic Domination
description: Directly invades the minds of leaders, bypassing armies.

name: False Prophecy
description: Spreads lies of salvation through divine tentacular messiahs.

name: Mindless Swarms
description: Hordes of cultists overwhelm cities through sheer numbers.

name: Data Corruption
description: Injects viral data worms into critical infrastructures.

name: Apocalyptic Revelation
description: Reveals inevitable doom, collapsing faith-based defenses.

name: Spore Bloom
description: Releases hallucinogenic spores to confuse and incapacitate armies.

name: Stealth Infiltration
description: Agents melt into the populace, striking from the shadows.

name: Cyber Psychosis
description: Breaks the minds of AI, turning machines against their creators.

name: Cultural Corruption
description: Dissolves cultural values, paving the way for cultist rule.

name: Eldritch Storm
description: Summons storms of chaos that cripple military defenses.

name: Deep Sea Horrors
description: Unleashes ancient leviathans from the depths to ravage ports.

name: Magnetic Pulse
description: Emits pulses that disable electronic defenses.

name: Resource Harvesting
description: Harvests the planetâ€™s resources to empower the cult.

name: False Currency
description: Destabilizes economies by flooding them with counterfeit resources.

name: Genetic Mutation
description: Alters the DNA of populations, creating obedient hybrids.

name: Dimension Rift
description: Opens portals to unknown horrors, destabilizing entire cities.

name: Dream Invasion
description: Manipulates leaders during their dreams to sow chaos.

name: Temporal Distortion
description: Slows time perception for enemy forces, reducing effectiveness.

name: Subterranean Spread
description: Cult structures expand underground, hidden from sight.

name: Eldritch Melody
description: A haunting melody that erodes the will of entire populations.

name: Shadow Market
description: Black market deals funnel resources into cultist operations.

name: Eldritch Beacon
description: Summons cosmic horrors to specific locations for destruction.

name: False Memory Implant
description: Erases and replaces critical memories of key figures.

name: Infested Waters
description: Contaminates water supplies with mind-altering parasites.

name: Dimensional Camouflage
description: Cultist structures and forces become nearly invisible.

name: Apex Predator
description: Unleashes a supreme entity to dominate the battlefield.

name: Corruption Wellspring
description: Creates nodes that spread corruption exponentially.

name: Subliminal Messages
description: Hidden messages in media slowly alter public perception.

name: Chaos Plague
description: Unleashes a mental plague that turns citizens into cultists.
